00036 
00040 void RequestHandlerOpen::run() {
00041   ResponseCallbackOpen cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00042   const char *name;
00043   uint32_t flags;
00044   uint32_t eventMask;  
00045   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->messageLen - 2;
00046   uint8_t *msgPtr = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00047   uint32_t attrCount;
00048   AttributeT attr;
00049   std::vector<AttributeT> initAttrs;
00050 
00051   // flags
00052   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &flags))
00053     goto abort;
00054 
00055   // event mask
00056   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &eventMask))
00057     goto abort;
00058 
00059   // directory name
00060   if (!Serialization::decode_string(&msgPtr, &remaining, &name))
00061     goto abort;
00062 
00063   // initial attribute count
00064   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &attrCount))
00065     goto abort;
00066 
00067   // 
00068   for (uint32_t i=0; i<attrCount; i++) {
00069     if (!Serialization::decode_string(&msgPtr, &remaining, &attr.name))
00070       goto abort;
00071     uint8_t *byte_ptr;
00072     if (!Serialization::decode_byte_array(&msgPtr, &remaining, &byte_ptr, &attr.valueLen))
00073       goto abort;
00074     attr.value = byte_ptr;
00075     initAttrs.push_back(attr);
00076   }
00077 
00078   m_master->open(&cb, m_session_id, name, flags, eventMask, initAttrs);
00079 
00080   return;
00081 
00082  abort:
00083   HT_ERROR("Encoding problem with OPEN message");
00084   cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Encoding problem with OPEN message");
00085 }
